summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 4th Avenue West, from West McGraw Place to West Newell Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 99505 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
